tool_description: Quick and easy API to get coronavirus statistics. We were among first coronavirus APIs  on this platform! Working more than a year for you!
title: Coronavirus monitor

api_list.name: random_masks_usage_instructions
api_list.description: Use these instructions as pictures to avoid infection
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/coronavirus/random_masks_usage_instructions.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: united_states_cases
api_list.description: This endpoint will return data about cases or coronavirus in United States by state
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/coronavirus/united_states_cases.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: latest_stat_by_country_iso_alpha_2
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides information about latest stat by country ISO alpha2 code. Codes list will be taken from iban site. 
https://www.iban.com/country-codes

required_parameters.name: alpha2
required_parameters.description:
ISO Alpha2 code. Required

Codes are from here: https://www.iban.com/country-codes

api_list.name: history_by_particular_country
api_list.description: We will return history by particular country that was provided in parameters.

api_list.name: johns_hopkins_latest_usa_statistic_by_state
api_list.description: Provides statistics by state about cases and deaths in U.S. based on Johns Hopkins

api_list.name: stat-by-country-iso-code
api_list.description: Get latest statistic by country iso code (3 letters)

api_list.name: stat-by-country-name
api_list.description: Get  latest country information by country name

api_list.name: world_total_stat
api_list.description: Total statistic for world cases, deaths, etc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/coronavirus/worldstat.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: latest_stat_by_country_name
api_list.description: Provides the most recent stat by provided country name

api_list.name: latest_stat_by_country_iso_alpha_3
api_list.description:
This endpoint provides information about latest stat by country ISO alpha3 code. Codes list will be taken from iban site.
https://www.iban.com/country-codes

required_parameters.name: alpha3
required_parameters.description:
Country alpha3 code taken from iban site. 
https://www.iban.com/country-codes

api_list.name: history_by_particular_country_by_date
api_list.description: Get history by country and date

api_list.name: cases_by_country
api_list.description: Return JSON with cases mapped by country map
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/coronavirus/cases_by_country.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
